Hero.description: Become an operator prepared for real missions. Real training programs for military, corporate teams, and individual learners.
Hero.descr_bottom_text_1: Become an operator prepared for real missions.
Hero.descr_bottom_text_2: Real training programs for military, corporate teams, and individual learners.

cart_1.description_event: FPV piloting from scratch: full theory, simulator practice, and daytime flights. Learn how to set up radio systems, video links, and batteries. Final test — accuracy and stability drills.

cart_2.description_event: Advanced training for pilots with basic skills. Complex scenarios, recovery after failures, fast reboots. Intensive practice with timed routes and accuracy tasks.

cart_3.description_event: Basic military drone training. Safe flight principles, quick launch, and aerial reconnaissance. Field tasks in small groups under instructor guidance.

card_1.description: Learn the basics of drone operation, safety protocols, legal regulations, and the role of drones in combat. Get the knowledge that keeps you alive and effective.

card_2.description: Field training on open grounds, simulating real-life scenarios: reconnaissance, coordination, navigation. Practice with expert instructors.

card_3.description: At the end — internal assessment and certification that proves your readiness and skills.

Testimonials.description: Voices of those who completed the training. Honest feedback, shared openly and without filters.

slide_1.name: Andriy
slide_1.text: Training gave me a clear understanding of how to use drones for reconnaissance. Field practice showed how to operate drones in real conditions, under stress and limited time.

slide_2.name: Maryna
slide_2.text: I had no prior experience, but after the course I can confidently fly a drone. The simulator helped me learn fast, and real flights built my skills.

slide_3.name: Oleh
slide_3.text: They explain complex technical things simply. Now I can set up radio systems and batteries myself — it boosted my confidence a lot.

slide_4.name: Serhiy
slide_4.text: This course feels as close to combat as possible. Tasks on precision and stability during the final test felt like a real mission.

slide_5.name: Iryna
slide_5.text: I wanted to be more useful. Now I can not only deliver drones but also launch them, collecting data for the units.

item_1.title: Expert Instructors
item_1.text: Our trainers are experienced pilots with both military and civilian backgrounds.

item_2.title: Mission-Focused Curriculum
item_2.text: Each course is designed to train for real-world tasks.

item_3.title: Advanced Simulations
item_3.text: Practice flights in realistic conditions before your first takeoff.

item_4.title: Career Support
item_4.text: We assist graduates with employment opportunities and professional growth.

flight_head.title: For Those Who Stand Guard
flight_head.text: Active service members receive free access to the first SkyMaster course. We value your contribution and want to support your professional growth.

TakeControl.title_big: Take Control of Drones and Soar Beyond Limits

slider: Master precision flight with hands-on drone training.
Learn together, analyze, and perfect every flight skill.
Train in VR, master drone control safely anywhere.
Elevate your skills with real-world drone flights.
Handle advanced drones with confidence and precision.
